keyMoments.title: Bluejam Pirates Execute Gray Terminal Fire
keyMoments.description: The Bluejam Pirates are tasked by the Goa nobility with burning down Gray Terminal, with false promises of nobility as reward.
keyMoments.significance: The crew becomes the instrument of mass murder for the nobility's cruel plan.

keyMoments.title: Bluejam Pirates Betrayed by Nobility
keyMoments.description: After successfully burning Gray Terminal, the crew discovers they've been betrayed and left to die in the fire they started.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that even those who serve corrupt systems are ultimately expendable.

keyMoments.title: Crew Knocked Out by Ace's Conqueror's Haki
keyMoments.description: All crew members except Bluejam are knocked unconscious when Ace unleashes Conqueror's Haki.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the power of Conqueror's Haki and the crew's relative weakness in willpower.

keyMoments.title: Dadan Family Witnesses Gray Terminal Fire
keyMoments.description: The Dadan Family sees the massive fire engulfing Gray Terminal from a distance and realizes Ace and Luffy are in danger.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the Dadan Family's rescue attempt in the following episode.
